xtagScrollDesc011: Summons a cloud of stinging hornets to bedevil your foes.
tagRelicName074: Incarnation of the Domain of the Dragon-Kings
xtagRelicName011: Embodiment of the Chill of Tartarus
tagSkillDescription182: Intense heat from the Ring of Flame softens the metal of enemy armor and weapons, decreasing their effectiveness.
xtagScrollDesc021: Rips the very fabric of the universe asunder, devastating all who enter its area of influence.
xtagMonsterAnouranHero07: Chief Bullfrog Gleek the Nimble ~ Pale Anouran Hero
tagMonsterName879: Dark Child of Pan ~ Elite Skirmisher
tagMonsterName567: Shade of the Damned ~ Fallen Sorceror
xtagSkillDreamDescription021: Force enemies to share the damage they inflict upon you by forming a telepathic link to their minds that conveys only pain and siphons life in retribution.
xtagRelicName014: Embodiment of the Shade of Hector
tagSkillDescription134: Increases the effectiveness of Batter causing it to hit three targets with enough force to dent their armor.
xtagSkillDreamDescription006: A field of psionic power bends the fabric of reality around the player, negating some of the damage from enemy attacks and dealing retaliatory damage to enemies that strike you.
tagSkillDescription236: Charges the target and executes an attack inflicting bonus damage.
tagSkillDescription184: Casts a protective heat shield on the target that absorbs damage caused by fire.
xtagRelicName013: Embodiment of the Rage of Ares
tagRelicName051: Incarnation of the Udjat of Horus
tagSkillDescription115: Allows the Core Dweller to ignite an area of ground causing severe burn damage to enemies within.
tagRelicName058: Essence of the Domain of the Dragon-Kings
tagSkillDescription211: You have been granted great wisdom and acuity of mind, significantly increasing how quickly you can gain experience.
xtagParchmentBody02: 0600{^N}Epirus Catacombs{^N}West Flank{^N}{^N}Today I was given command of the 4th Armored Infantry Division.  My abdomen trembles with excitement and a hunger for battle.  I’ve been told that a group of four heroes is coming our way, and my men have been making their preparations.  Our swords are sharp, our bellies are full, and our carapaces have been polished to a mirror sheen.  Additionally, word has come down from HQ that we will be allowed to use the new bio-magical enhancements to enhance our strength and durability.  This is standard operating procedure in cases dealing with more than one hero at a time, but I appreciate their quick response.  The morale boost from this kind of support is something that simply cannot be underestimated.{^N}{^N}But the time for talk is over – the enemy comes.{^N}{^N}I am ready.
xtagSkillDreamDescription027: The Nightmare penetrates the mind of an enemy and unleashes a flood of horrifying thoughts.
tagRelicDescription14: Isis is queen of the Egyptian gods.  Her symbol, the ankh, is associated with healing and immortality.  Can enchant rings and amulets.
tagRelicName036: Essence of the Ankh of Isis
tagRelicDescription25: Shen-Nong is the Chinese god of plants and medicine. He is a master of herbs - and not all are meant to cure.  Can enchant all weapons.
tagSkillDescription045: In ages past, powerful sorcerers learned how to cheat Hades and persist as undead liches long after death had robbed their bodies of life.  A dangerous practice of Theurgists is to bind the souls of these ancient liches to their will, thus acquiring their powers.
xtagRelicName010: Embodiment of the Blade of Thanatos
xtagMonsterSkeletonHero06: Xenokrates of the Shadowblade ~ Skeleton Hero
xtagAnimalPartDesc004: The agonized soul of a creature of darkness.  Can enhance all jewelry.
tagRelicName004: Essence of the Aegis of Athena
tagMonsterName1150: Lo Yung, Prince of the Damned ~ Fallen Hero
tagSkillDescription213: This powerful wizard's trick causes your staff to shoot three projectiles by channeling magical energy into it.  Initially each hit is not as powerful as a normal attack but the effectiveness increases every level.
xtagScrollDesc005: Inspires the caster, greatly improving their offensive capabilities in melee combat.
tagSkillDescription082: Modifications to the Bolt Trap increase the number of bolts fired per round.
tagSkillDescription022: Projects a deadly shard of ice at the target inflicting cold damage and temporarily slowing them.
tagSkillDescription040: Channels spirit energy from the ether at the expense of life.  Once channeling begins, the process cannot be stopped until it has run its course.
tagSkillDescription196: A hidden explosive charge causes the monster lure to detonate when destroyed.  In order to detonate the lure must be at full energy.
tagSkillDescription013: Provides a chance to block incoming attacks with your weapons while Dual Wielding.
tagSkillDescription234: Infuses the player with arcane power, dramatically increasing energy regeneration.
tagRelicDescription02: Achilles was the greatest of all the Greek warriors of the Trojan War.  His strength and speed in battle were legendary.  Can enchant all weapons.
xtagRelicName002: Essence of the Cunning of Odysseus
tagSkillDescription100: Tempers armor, increasing protection and fire resistance while under the effects of Earth Enchantment.
tagSkillDescription058: A magician's trick turned to more nefarious purposes, flash powder blinds adjacent enemies impairing their ability to hit with weapons and potentially disorienting them.
xtagSkillArtifactDescription003: Smites your foes with three powerful jets of freezing water.
tagSkillDescription116: Provides the fortitude and strength to master skills for the protection of yourself and others.
tagRelicName050: Incarnation of the Djed of Osiris
xtagScrollDesc026: Creates a maelstrom of destructive power around the caster.
tagMonsterName1227: Qin Du, the Emperor's Dog ~ Terra Cotta Hero
tagSkillDescription166: Jagged thorns sprout from the player's body, damaging any enemies foolish enough to attack.
xtagScroll064: Greater Scroll of the Ice Nova
tagAnimalPartDesc001: The thick, coarse pelt of the Yeti.  Can enhance all armor.
xtagSetName013: Raiment of the Baker Street Sage
tagSkillDescription112: Draws forth a powerful elemental guardian from the Earth's fiery depths.
tagSkillDescription208: Gathers the living essence torn from creatures by Death Nova and uses it to supplement your lost life.
tagMonsterName564: Shade of the Damned ~ Fallen Warrior
tagSkillDescription098: Trains your mind and spirit in ancient techniques that will enable you to draw power from the Earth and gain mastery over rock and fire.
xtagScrollDesc017: Vastly increases the amount of damage the caster can do, but only lasts a very short time.
xtagSkillDreamDescription019: Waves of negative psionic energy emanate from the player, disrupting enemy thoughts and burning through their physical being.
tagSkillDescription150: Intense cold damages enemies and makes them highly vulnerable to fire while in their frozen state.
xtagSkillDreamDescription014: The Nightmare is able to speak to the minds of your other minions and coordinate their attacks, making them more effective in combat.
xtagParchmentBody14: Such sweet music, the wailing of men.{^N}{^N}The siege continues, My Lord.  My blade cuts through their soldiers like a scythe through wheat.  I feast upon their sorrow, their despair.  We have taken the Styx and the Tower of Judgment, and even the fields of Elysium themselves have begun to fall.  They send their greatest heroes, men of legends, yet they are no match for the power of your armies.  We fall upon them like locusts upon the field, ripping their very souls from existence.  Not even the comfort of death awaits those foolish enough to oppose us. {^N}{^N}Soon, our dominance shall be complete.  You shall hold the world of the living in the palm of your hand, a bauble for your amusement.  I pray to Your Eminence for that day to come, pray for the day when the death can stop – and the torture begin.
xtagScrollDesc013: Scorches the surrounding area with a blast of lightning, damaging and stunning all nearby enemies.
tagSkillDescription064: Even the sturdiest armor has its chinks, the best way to stay alive is to not get hit.
tagSkillDescription212: Slip through the barriers of your enemies' consciousness and dominate their mind, binding them to your will.  While enslaved your enemy will be forced to obey your commands but eventually they will regain control of their mind and turn against you.  Ineffective against monsters five or more levels above you.
xtagRelicName018: Incarnation of the Chill of Tartarus
tagMonsterName1241: Wolfbiter, Clan Hunt master ~ Yerren Hero
xtagRelicDescription03: Thanatos, the incarnation of death, carries a sword with the power to rend the very souls of mere mortals.  Can enchant all weapons.
tagSkillDescription103: Increases the damage and number of flame jets created by Flame Surge.
xtagMonsterAnouranHero06: Chief Bullfrog Tlich Mossback ~ Pale Anouran Hero
tagSkillDescription078: Barbed hooks on the hunter's Ensnare net tear into enemies as they struggle causing them to bleed.
tagMonsterName1226: Jjang Fei, Imperial Assassin ~ Terra Cotta Hero
tagMonsterName060: Sand Wraithlord ~ Nightmare of the Desert
tagSkillDescription147: Magically exchange places with an enemy or ally over short distances.
xtagSkillArtifactDescription008: Calls down flaming meteorites from the sky above.
xtagSkillEquipmentDescription003: A wave of soothing relief that washes over enemies temporarily rendering them unconscious.
xtagScrollDesc002: Fills the caster with incredible fury, increasing their speed and the damage of their attacks.
tagSkillDescription167: The player's movement speed is greatly enhanced.
xtagParchmentBody15: THRILL!{^N}To feats of Wonderment and Awe{^N}{^N}GASP! {^N}At his death-defying bravery{^N}{^N}GAPE!{^N}Into his hypnotic eyes{^N}{^N}Come one, come all!  For the first time ever, the Amazing Artius will dazzle the world with stunts and tricks to fright and delight the whole family.  You’ve never seen anything like this!  You won’t believe your eyes!  Watch in wonder as a grown woman floats across the stage!  Marvel at showers of gold that fall from thin air!  And for the first time ever, the Amazing Artius will tame the untamable:  see his mastery over the wild beasts of nature as he leads a live Yeti through hoops of fire! {^N}{^N}LIMITED TIME ENGAGEMENT
xtagMonsterMelinoeHero04: Blood Mistress Gorgo, Queen of Shadows ~ Melinoe Hero
tagSkillDescription090: Targeting vital weak-points on your enemy causes sustained damage from bleeding.
tagSkillDescription079: Those who answer the call of the hunt will fight with increased speed and cunning.
xtagParchmentBody12: 4 living Karkinosi{^N}1 Salt Spitter turtle, chopped{^N}2 Cybe mushrooms, sauteed{^N}5 quarts demon’s blood{^N}2 sticks of butter{^N}{^N}Heat demon’s blood and butter over Carved Fire Staff to 300 degrees.  Do not use Earth Enchantment or similar enhancements, as the arcane energies from these skills will cause congealing.  Stir in turtle.  Keep heat at 300 degrees, stir occasionally.  When mixture has turned a pale mucous-green, add mushrooms and Karkinosi.  The Karkinosi will squirm and attempt to kill you as you thrust them into the bubbling mixture, but do not let this bother you – causing pain to monsters is what heroes are born to do. {^N}{^N}Once the death struggles have ceased, lower heat.  Let simmer for 3 hours.  Serve and enjoy!
xtagParchmentBody11: Victory at last!{^N}{^N}The Achaeans, those weak, puling fools, have finally admitted the superiority of our military might.  Their pathetic siege has at last ended.  You should have seen it, my friend – the sight of their ships turning tail and fleeing toward the horizon.  Never before has the day dawned on a sight so sweet.{^N}{^N}Tonight, we revel.  After so many years of fighting, it will be nice to finally let my guard down and drink deep of the draught of Dionysus.  Fathers, lock up your daughters – tonight I am on the hunt!{^N}{^N}{^N}Jubilantly Yours,{^N}{^N}Karos the Younger{^N}{^N}{^N}P.S.  Almost forgot to mention this, but they left behind a magnificent – and quite large – wooden horse!  I’m not quite sure what we’re meant to do with it.  We already have some nice statues for decoration, and it doesn’t seem to have any practical use.  Oh well, I guess we’ll just pull it inside and figure out where to put it later.
xtagScroll046: Divine Scroll of the Crushing Vortex
xtagSkillArtifactDescription017: Attempts to drain the soul of an enemy, doing enough damage to kill all but the strongest foes and delivering their health to the player.
xtagSkillDreamDescription023: A subtle acceleration of time around the player allows them to move more quickly, anticipate attacks, and negate the slowing effects of enemy skills.
tagSkillDescription197: Stuns victims of Lethal Strike and greatly magnifies the impact of poison and bleeding damage caused by the attack.
xtagMonsterAnteokHero01: Elatos, Lord of the Greenwood ~ Anteok Hero
tagSkillDescription019: When activated, each enemy hit has a chance of unleashing a violent squall of storm energy.
tagSkillDescription073: Causes regrowth energy to disseminate from the initial target and leap to additional nearby allies.
tagMonsterName1231: Shao Hsin the Wanderer ~ Tigerman Hero
xtagRelicName005: Essence of the Iron Will of Ajax
xtagAnimalPartDesc005: A sticky mass of webbing pulled from an Albino Spider abdomen.  Can enhance all armor.
xtagScroll056: Greater Scroll of the Storm Witches
xtagSkillArtifactDescription013: Trap a large group of monsters with the power of the sea god.
tagSkillDescription066: Casting these magic seeds to the ground will cause an animated Stinging Nettle plant to spontaneously spring up.
tagAnimalPartDesc017: The intricate inner workings of an automaton.  Can enhance torso armor only.
tagSkillDescription151: Creates a wind storm in the target area that decreases the projectile attack accuracy of enemies caught within it.
xtagSkillArtifactDescription001: Summons forth three undead warriors to defend the player.
tagSkillDescription018: Provides the mental control and spiritual focus to unfetter your mind of earthly concerns and learn to harness the elemental power of weather.
xtagRelicDescription04: In the deepest pits of the underworld lies Tartarus.  Cold as the grave and swathed in darkness, it is here that punishment is meted out for those mortals foolish enough to oppose the will of the gods.  Can enchant all weapons.
tagRelicName063: Embodiment of the Jade Emperor's Serenity
tagSkillDescription133: A shield attack that hits for increased damage and slows enemies' attacks for a duration.
xtagScrollDesc030: Lashes out in fiery retaliation each time the caster is struck by a melee attack.
xtagSkillDreamDescription020: A restful state of mind causes increased life recovery and damage absorption for the player and allies.
tagMonsterName1246: Huang Fay the Unclean ~ Zombie Hero
xtagScrollDesc009: Blasts surrounding enemies with a wave of energy that saps their physical strength, greatly reducing their ability to deal damage with most weapons.
xtagScroll020: Greater Scroll of the Feral Spirit
tagRelicName002: Essence of the Valor of Achilles
xtagRelicDescription05: Numbered among the greatest of the heroes of the Trojan war, Ajax was known not only for the strength of his arm, but even more for his indomitable spirit.  Can enchant all armor.
xtagSkillArtifactDescription011: A protective barrier appears around the player, reflecting enemies' spells back at them for a duration.
tagSkillDescription124: A percentage of all damage inflicted by enemies will be revisited back upon them for a short duration after using Rally.
tagSkillDescription043: Causes the Liche King's Spectral Energy Bolt to chain and hit additional enemies, damaging each one it strikes.
tagSkillDescription017: Years of training with the sword, axe, and club allow you to attack faster and react quickly to enemy attacks.
tagRelicName045: Embodiment of the Udjat of Horus
xtagRelicName016: Incarnation of the Cunning of Odysseus
xtagMonsterEmpusaHero06: Canace the Serpent Queen ~ Empusa Hero
xtagFormulaDescription066: Arcane Formula ~ Golden Eye of Sun Wukong
tagSkillDescription170: Incorporating a more streamlined shaft into your arrows allows them to pass through targets and hit additional enemies in their path.
tagMonsterName1160: Podarge, Reaver of Pelion ~ Harpy Hero
xtagSkillDreamDescription018: Psionic energies ignite into a surge of electrical power that causes horrific burning over a short duration.
xtagAnimalPartDesc002: A patch of rough, durable skin ripped from the flesh of a Hydradon.  Can enhance all armor.
tagRelicName039: Essence of the Udjat of Horus
tagSkillDescription193: Adds a hidden explosive charge to the monster lure causing it to detonate when destroyed.  In order to detonate the lure must be at full energy.
xtagSkillEquipmentDescription002: A concentrated blast of poison that eradicates pesky enemies.
xtagRelicName021: Incarnation of the Shade of Hector
xtagRelicName004: Essence of the Chill of Tartarus
xtagFormulaDescription016: Arcane Formula ~ Song of the Serpent
tagRelicDescription06: Hecate is a mysterious Greek goddess associated with the moon, childbirth, and magic.  Can enchant rings and amulets.
tagRelicDescription04: The Aegis is the shield of Athena, Greek goddess of battle.  Can enchant shields only.
xtagSkillDreamDescription002: Psionic energies focused within your weapons will create a bone shattering resonance when they contact your enemies. {^y}Apply this skill to your left mouse button.
tagAnimalPartDesc006: The thick outer shell of an insectoid monster.  Can enhance shields only.
tagAnimalPartDesc015: A long, sharp claw.  Can enhance all weapons.
tagRelicName026: Incarnation of the Aegis of Athena
tagSkillDescription074: Subtracts time from recharging skills allowing you to use them more frequently.
xtagSkillEquipmentDescription006: A blast of energy that crushes the spirit of all surrounding enemies.
tagMonsterName1242: Jacinto, the Rotten Hyacinth of Thessaly ~ Zombie Hero
tagSkillDescription093: Grants those who follow the hunt endurance to relentlessly track their quarry, preventing even the most tangled thicket from slowing pursuit.
xtagSkillDreamDescription017: A wave of force is projected towards enemies that forms chaotic ripples in the fabric of reality and delivers devastating damage to the body and mind of enemies.
tagRelicName071: Incarnation of the Jade Emperor's Serenity
tagSkillDescription190: Causes enemies who hit the Briar Ward to suffer poisoning.
xtagSkillDreamDescription028: The Nightmare bolsters the confidence of an ally with empowering thoughts.
tagSkillDescription183: Enhanced by the volatile energy of the Earth, your fire attacks have a chance of inflicting greatly increased damage.
xtagScrollDesc031: Summons a mighty Djinn spellcaster.  Though powerful in war, the Djinn is also valuable for the mystical enhancements it provides for the caster and their allies.
tagSkillDescription210: Causes Life Drain to blast through the primary target and hit multiple enemies.
xtagSkillArtifactDescription014: Quickly restores the player to full health and energy.
xtagSkillEquipmentDescription009: Cries of impending doom possess enemies with terror
tagSkillDescription029: Electrical energy builds inside the player while Storm Nimbus is active and passes through enemy weapons that come in contact, delivering a powerful shock.
tagSkillDescription118: Increases damage and attack speed during an adrenaline rush.
tagSkillDescription205: A wisp ability that increases elemental damage of all nearby allies for a duration and provides protection from lightning and cold damage.
tagSkillDescription219: Scalds enemies with a blast of elemental energy.
tagSkillDescription108: Increases the Core Dweller's speed and adds fire damage to its attacks.
xtagScrollDesc008: Raises a putrid zombie from the ground which will spread a plague throughout your enemies' ranks upon death.
tagMonsterName1221: Epeius, Ravager of Troy ~ Skeletal Hero
tagSkillDescription068: A protective grove of briars grows around you that enemies cannot pass through.
tagSkillDescription102: Calls down fiery brimstones during Rain of Fire that explode on impact igniting the ground in flames.
tagRelicDescription20: The Monkey King, the most mischievous of all the Chinese gods, is also one of the most powerful.  His cunning has lured many an unwary foe to do his bidding.  Can enchant rings and amulets.
tagSkillDescription194: Lobs a bomb that will burst on impact releasing a cloud of toxic gas that damages enemies and impairs their attacks.
xtagSkillDreamDescription015: Puts enemies to sleep, rendering them immobile for a duration or until awakened by an attack.
xtagScrollDesc018: Summons a sadistic demon to lead your foes astray.
xtagScrollDesc022: Summons an enormous demonic beast from the netherworld.
tagSkillDescription070: Causes thorns to sprout from your Briar Ward that will damage enemies that hit it.
xtagSkillDreamDescription024: The mesmerizing stare of the Nightmare is able to dominate lesser minds and throw them into a state of confusion, causing them to wander aimlessly and attack phantom images.
xtagSkillDreamDescription029: A beam of psionic energy surges into an enemy, causing terrible damage.
tagSkillDescription232: Casts a protective ward that will reduce the damage of undead attacks on the player and nearby allies.
xtagParchmentBody05: Grievances and Tribulations, Underworld division{^N}Please remove bottom copy for your records.{^N}{^N}Please describe the nature of your complaint:{^N}Sword in belly.{^N}{^N}Please describe what we can do to help:{^N}Remove sword from belly.{^N}{^N}Additional comments/concerns:{^N}Ouch.
tagAnimalPartDesc012: A large turtle shell.  Can enhance shields only.
tagSkillDescription083: Drops a mechanical bolt trap that will trip when enemies draw near and rapidly fire out deadly bolts.
tagSkillDescription202: Calls forth a powerful extra-dimensional entity from beyond the ether.  The link can only be maintained for a short time.
tagSkillDescription235: Releases an electrical ring of energy that stuns enemies within its radius.
xtagScrollDesc027: Encases the caster in a mystic shield that absorbs damage from all elemental attacks.
tagSkillDescription101: Increases the explosion radius of Volcanic Orb and causes enemies hit by it to catch fire and suffer burn damage.
tagSkillDescription097: Drops down a decoy to attract the attention of nearby monsters.
tagRelicDescription11: Archimedes was one of the greatest of Greece's philosophers and scientists.  Can enchant shields only.
xtagScroll034: Divine Scroll of the Feral Spirit
tagSkillDescription181: Gives Energy Shield the ability to reflect a portion of enemy attack damage back at enemies who hit it.
tagSkillDescription176: Nymph draws on the spirit of oak to protect allies from damage and augment their life.
tagSkillDescription004: Provides a chance to counter attack an enemy after being hit in Battle Rage.
tagMonsterName565: Shade of the Damned ~ Fallen Hero
xtagScroll057: Divine Scroll of the Storm Witches
xtagScrollDesc006: Grants the caster insight into the mind of the dark beasts, improving their effectiveness when fighting these foes.
tagSkillDescription156: A pulse of negatively charged energy dispels hostile enchantments on allies or, when cast on enemies, breaks their beneficial enchantments and negates a portion of their energy.  This attack inflicts bonus damage when used against Magical creatures.
tagSkillDescription125: A shield fighting technique that inflicts damage with both the weapon and the shield.
tagRelicDescription01: Zeus is the mightiest of the gods of Olympus.  The thunderbolt is his weapon and symbol.  Can enchant all weapons.
tagRelicName065: Embodiment of the Code of Hammurabi
tagSkillDescription130: Grants allies the resolve to hold out against great adversity.
tagSkillDescription009: A Dual Wield technique that can hit up to 2 enemies with a cross-cutting scissor motion.
tagSkillDescription185: Reduces the recharge time of Flame Surge allowing it to be cast more frequently and efficiently.
xtagSkillDreamDescription003: Psionic energy within the target ignites and explodes outward, burning through their material being and inflicting severe damage to adjacent targets.
tagMonsterName1243: Charisma, Fallen Mistress of Odysseus ~ Zombie Hero
tagMonsterName568: Shade of the Damned ~ Fallen Archmage
tagMonsterName1186: Dragon Liche ~ Lord of the Undead
xtagSkillDreamDescription012: Calls forth a nightmarish phantasm from the dream world to serve as your familiar.
tagSkillDescription003: Provides a chance for attacks to cause bonus damage while in Battle Rage.
tagAnimalPartDesc010: The dark blood of a fallen demon.  Can enhance rings and amulets.
xtagMonsterMachaeHero03: Warlord Taor-Kenth the Murderer ~ Machae Hero
tagMonsterName876: Dark Child of Pan ~ Veteran Skirmisher
tagSkillDescription063: Adds a chance that weapon attacks will inflict bleeding damage when using a sword, spear, bow, or axe.
tagSkillDescription081: Casts a weighted net around the feet of an enemy holding them in place but not preventing them from attacking if you are within their range.
xtagMonsterLostSoulHero02: Pedaeus the Unwary ~ Lost Soul Hero
tagMonsterName1157: Aello, the Talon of the Storm ~ Harpy Hero
xtagScroll054: Divine Scroll of the Arrow Dancer
tagSkillDescription085: Provides a chance that arrows will pass through enemies and continue on to hit additional targets when using Marksmanship.
xtagScrollDesc024: Summons the avatar of a mad god.  Although control can only be maintained for a short while, the god can wreak havoc in even this short time span.
tagSkillDescription028: When Storm Nimbus is active, the air around the player becomes icy cold and slows any attackers within its perimeter
xtagSkillEquipmentDescription001: A field of energy that absorbs damage from all incoming attacks.
tagSkillDescription084: Hunting experience gives you the edge when facing familiar quarry such as Animals and Beastmen.
tagSkillDescription162: Protects allies from the elements, reducing the damage caused by elemental based attacks.
xtagScrollDesc016: Raises a force of flame-enchanted skeletal warriors to do the caster's bidding.
tagRelicName062: Embodiment of the Monkey King's Trickery
xtagRelicName020: Incarnation of the Rage of Ares
tagSkillDescription011: An attack aimed at the enemy's legs reduces their ability to run and increases their vulnerability for a short duration.
tagSkillDescription136: Grants the ability to absorb energy from the skill enemies use against you.
tagMonsterName1410: Tidal Ichthian – Lord of the Deep
tagMonsterName880: Dark Child of Pan ~ Spirit Caller
xtagParchmentBody06: Dear Diary,{^N}{^N}Today Phaedrus bet me that I couldn’t kill one of those little frog guys that have been running around the countryside.  Is he kidding?  They’re half my size and don’t even wear armor most of the time!  This is going to be easy money.{^N}{^N}I mean, really.  What could go wrong?
xtagSkillArtifactDescription010: Raw elemental forces of fire and ice are invoked, colliding with each other in an explosion of terrific power.
tagSkillDescription207: Emits a wave of death that will deplete life from any living being it contacts.
xtagScroll045: Greater Scroll of the Crushing Vortex
xtagMonsterLostSoulHero03: Aberkios of the Ashes ~ Lost Soul Hero
tagSkillDescription126: A fighting technique that utilizes the shield to crush foes and throw them off-balance.
xtagScrollDesc025: Turns the inner power of surrounding enemies against them, burning their bodies with the power of their own magic.
xtagScroll035: Divine Scroll of the Dark Arts
tagSkillDescription198: Expertise with traps and magical devices allows the Rogue to easily disable them and avoid their damage.
tagSkillDescription053: While active, this skill ensures that the blades on the swords or spears of yourself and allies will remain razor sharp and inflict increased piercing damage.
tagSkillDescription044: Allows the Liche King to diminish its corporeal presence making it less vulnerable to all types of damage.
tagSkillDescription051: With a deep knowledge of anatomy, attacks can be directed at vital points in the body increasing the chance and effectiveness of bleed damage.
tagMonsterName1122: Ocnus the Black ~ Dark Boarman Hero
xtagScroll022: Greater Scroll of the Plague Corpse
tagSkillDescription216: Strikes with otherworldly energy that has the power to sear an enemy's spirit from the very fabric of reality.
tagSkillDescription075: Allows Regrowth to be cast more frequently.
tagSkillDescription087: Expertise in assembling traps reduces the amount of time it takes to create a new trap after one has been set.
tagSkillDescription008: A Dual Wield technique that hits up to 3 adjacent enemies.
xtagSkillArtifactDescription016: Bloodfire tears of the god Ares rain down upon the Earth, causing bleeding and fire damage on all who are struck.
tagSkillDescription016: The triumphant call of your war horn temporarily stuns enemies.
xtagScroll061: Greater Scroll of the Stalwart Alliance
tagSkillDescription042: Allows the Liche King to create an explosion of negative energy that damages enemy's constitution making them more susceptible to all forms of damage.
tagRelicName015: Embodiment of the Aegis of Athena
tagSkillDescription048: Summons a totem that holds a powerful spirit, infusing you and all allies with great mental energy while standing close to it.
tagSkillDescription153: Increases the Core Dweller's speed and adds fire damage to its attacks.
xtagMonsterAnouranHero08: Tribal Shaman Schlilsh Toadskin ~ Pale Anouran Hero
tagSkillDescription157: Inflicts energy burn damage and disrupts enemy spell-casters' ability to use skills as their beneficial enchantments are abruptly shattered by Spell Breaker.
tagMonsterName1123: Panos, Lord of the Briarwood ~ Centaur Hero
tagSkillDescription135: Assume the form of a towering Colossus and lay waste to your enemies.
tagSkillDescription171: A secret of master fletchers is the ability to craft special arrow heads that burst on impact sending out razor-sharp fragments in all directions.  Each shard delivers piercing damage to the enemies it hits.
xtagSkillDreamDescription016: Increased conscious control over your dream state enhances abilities that derive power from the dream world.
tagRelicName013: Embodiment of the Valor of Achilles
tagRelicName073: Incarnation of the Code of Hammurabi
tagSkillDescription086: When the horn is sounded spirit wolves will join the hunt.
tagSkillDescription031: When active... a deathly chill radiates from the character slowing the attack and movement of enemies.
xtagSkillArtifactDescription007: Poisoned darts fire outward from the player in all directions.
xtagRelicName019: Incarnation of the Iron Will of Ajax
xtagSkillEquipmentDescription005: A devastating attack that is especially effective vs. low level druids.
xtagSkillArtifactDescription009: Shakes the ground and sends a shockwave of disturbed earth toward your foe.
tagSkillDescription036: Accelerates the effects of time on adjacent enemies' equipment causing weapons to dull and armor to crumble.
xtagMonsterFormicidHero01: Queen Ch'kra the Dark ~ Formicid Hero
tagSkillDescription165: Attack speed and damage are increased.
xtagScrollDesc020: Grants the caster improved reflexes, allowing them to dodge most incoming projectiles.
tagSkillDescription076: Imparts the predatory spirit and cunning necessary to learn the arts of hunting.
tagRelicName044: Embodiment of the Djed of Osiris
tagSkillDescription142: Uncommonly good fortune provides a chance that calculated strikes will slip past enemy armor causing tremendous damage.
tagSkillDescription177: A gnawing attack that rends enemy flesh causing bleed damage for a short duration.
tagMonsterName1234: S'zkit'ith, Mother of Horrors ~ Tropical Arachnos Hero
tagSkillDescription186: Saps the strength from diseased enemies causing them to move more slowly and fight less effectively.
xtagMonsterLamiaHero04: Ismene, Battle-Lord of the Plains ~ Lamia Hero
tagMonsterName1144: Jabari Lin, the Crimson Viper ~ Dune Raider Hero
tagSkillDescription012: A Dual Wield technique that causes increased damage by 50%.
tagSkillDescription054: Used in place of your normal attack, every fourth hit with calculated strike will deliver increased damage.{^y}  Apply this skill to your left mouse button.
xtagRelicDescription01: Persephone, favored daughter of the earth goddess Demeter, was forced into marriage with Hades.  She now shares rule of the underworld, yet it brings her only sorrow.  Can enchant all jewelry.
tagRelicDescription03: Artemis, the Greek goddess of the hunt, is renowned for her skill with the bow.  Can enchant bows only.
tagDyeDescription: Dye can be used to change the base color of your tunic.
tagRelicName038: Essence of the Djed of Osiris
tagMonsterName1412: Deadwater Ichthian – Lord of the Deep
tagMonsterName1411: Coastal Ichthian – Lord of the Deep
tagSkillDescription005: When used as your default weapon attack, Onslaught charges up as you hit enemies causing increased damage for up to twice the original damage bonus. The first hit adds a charge equivalent to the first level of the skill and it continues to charge until it reaches your current skill level. Onslaught dissipates rapidly when not actively attacking.  {^y}Apply this skill to your left mouse button.
xtagAnimalPartDesc003: Blood drained from a Fury's still-beating heart.  Can enhance all weapons.
xtagRelicDescription06: Ares, the Greek god of war, is venerated and feared in equal measure.  He is cruel, vengeful, and nearly mad - only a fool would risk his wrath.  Can enchant armbands and bracelets.
tagSkillDescription173: A combat technique that uses the spear or bow to rapidly strike three times in succession.
tagSkillDescription217: Casts a bolt of spectral energy that depletes life from any living thing it touches.
tagSkillDescription129: Focus allows you and your allies to react quickly to enemy attacks increasing the chance of a successful shield block.
tagSkillDescription089: A brutal thrust from your spear delivers devastating piercing damage to enemies and diminishes a portion of your enemy's total life.
tagSkillDescription188: Allows the Nymph to create a living shield around allies that absorbs damage and harms enemies that strike it.
tagSkillDescription179: Seeing the inevitability of your triumph, enemies lose hope and the strength of their attack diminishes.
xtagScrollDesc033: Calls on the power of the skies to rain fury upon nearby enemies.
tagSkillDescription033: Leeches life from an enemy to replenish your own.
tagSkillDescription161: Provides a chance to use skills at 50% reduced energy cost while under the effect of Heart of Oak.
tagSkillDescription037: Weakens the constitution of adjacent enemies making them more susceptible to attacks that directly damage their life such as vitality damage and life leeching.
tagSkillDescription010: Learn to effectively wield two weapons.
tagRelicDescription09: Hermes the Messenger is the swiftest of the Greek gods.  He is known for his iconic winged sandals.  Can enchant leg armor only.
tagSkillDescription132: Increases how often an Adrenaline rush can be triggered.
xtagScrollDesc012: Strengthens the will of the caster, greatly improving their ability to withstand damage in battle.
xtagMonsterNightstalkerHero03: Minkah, Lord of Fury ~ Nightstalker Hero
tagSkillDescription168: Grants the player improved proficiency with all skills.
xtagFormulaDescription057: Arcane Formula ~ Symbol of the Polymath
xtagScrollDesc007: Calls on the powers of the underworld to enhance the caster's attacks with life-disrupting power.
tagRelicDescription13: Anubis, a jackal-headed god, is ruler of the Egyptian underworld.  Can enchant all weapons.
xtagFormulaDescription033: Arcane Formula ~ Effigy of the Panther
xtagMonsterFormicidHero04: Queen Kch'rit the Hungry ~ Pale Formicid Hero
xtagMonsterEmpusaHero05: Thyia of the Stygian Frosts ~ Empusa Hero
tagMonsterName1232: Prince Ch'kik't the Horrible ~ Tropical Arachnos Hero
tagMonsterName1117: Chk'ich of the Queensguard ~ Arachnos Hero
tagMonsterName1163: Ksathra, Prince of Atlantis ~ Ichthian Hero
tagMonsterName1237: Oenemaus the Wrathful, Lichelord of the Paethian Gate ~ Wraith Hero
xtagSkillArtifactDescription005: Sends forth a barrage of lightning bolts to strike your foes.
tagSkillDescription201: Drawing upon ancient arcane craft the Liche King forms deadly bolts of elemental energy and launches them at enemies.
tagAnimalPartDesc009: The razor-sharp claw of a Saber Lion.  Can enhance all weapons.
xtagRelicDescription02: Although not as strong or swift as the other heroes of legend, Odysseus' formidable guile made him a match for any foe.  Can enchant head armor only.
tagMonsterName566: Shade of the Damned ~ Fallen Mage
tagSkillDescription233: Adds damage against undead to the attacks of those under the effects of Spirit Ward.
tagSkillDescription105: Imbues your weapons and the weapons of nearby allies with the power of rock and flame.
tagSkillDescription123: Gradually restores lost energy to allies allowing them to continue the fight.
xtagScrollDesc001: Sends a devastating flurry of blades in all directions.
tagRelicName048: Incarnation of the Ankh of Isis
xtagSkillDreamDescription025: A confident state of mind that increases all damage done by player and ally attacks.
tagSkillDescription095: By observing your prey from a distance you may discover its weakness, resulting in greater pierce damage.
tagSkillDescription067: Grants gradual but sustained healing while active.
tagSkillDescription159: Summons a wolf companion to fight with you in battle.  At higher levels more wolves can be controlled at once.
xtagMonsterMelinoeHero03: Blood Mistress Endeis the Unholy ~ Melinoe Hero
tagSkillDescription002: Each enemy hit has a chance of sending you into a battle rage that adds bonus damage to attacks and increases Offensive Ability for a short duration.
tagSkillDescription077: Central to survival in the wilderness is the ability to hunt with bow and spear.  Great familiarity with these weapons allows you to wield them with exceptional speed and precision.
xtagScroll033: Divine Scroll of the Warrior's Song
xtagParchmentBody13: You won’t believe this, but My Hero came this way again, and guess what – he killed the stupid sorceress first AGAIN!!  I’m so tired of being ignored.  Am I not pretty enough for him?  He’s so stupid.{^N}{^N}Kat says there are plenty of fish in the sea, but what does food have to do with anything?  How can I eat when I’m in LOVE?  Sigh.  I wish he’d pay attention to me.  Maybe if I carried a better bow?  I know a couple months ago he went right for Stupid Susan when she had that dumb flaming spear.  But do I really want a guy that’s just going to pay attention to me for my loot?  What about MY needs? {^N}{^N}Boys are so stupid!
xtagRelicName003: Essence of the Blade of Thanatos
tagAnimalPartDesc007: Feathers from a carrion bird.  Can enhance all armor.
tagSkillDescription092: A surprising strike that will deliver most Animals and Beastmen to their grave.
tagMonsterName1174: Medierra, Mistress of the Blade ~ Maenad Hero
tagSkillDescription109: Volcanic fissures form in the ground, emitting deadly geysers of molten flame and fiery chunks of brimstone.  Each fragment inflicts physical and fire damage to the enemies it hits.
tagSkillDescription163: Increases how often an Adrenaline rush can be triggered.
tagSkillDescription189: Imbues the Nymph's attacks with the power of the elements.
tagSkillDescription106: Causes the Volcanic Orb to violently explode on impact sending out fragments of rock that each inflict physical damage to the enemies they hit.
tagSkillDescription039: Places a magical ward on the player that protects them from death by granting additional life when their life gets dangerously low.
xtagFormulaDescription059: Arcane Formula ~ Crescent Moon of Artemis
tagSkillDescription158: Summons a powerful forest Nymph who can bring down enemies with her magical bow and cast enchantments to strengthen allies in battle.
tagRelicDescription24: The Dragon-Kings are the masters of water in China.  Ocean, rain, lake, and river - all are theirs to command.  Can enchant all armor.
xtagScrollDesc015: Lays down a field of vampiric energy.  The life force of any enemies who cross into this field will be ripped from their souls and transferred to the caster.
xtagRelicName007: Essence of the Shade of Hector
xtagParchmentBody17: by Minkah, Lord of Poesy{^N}{^N}{^N}The ball of fire in the sky{^N}It rises daily, I know not why{^N}But when it falls and goes away{^N}The Nightstalkers come out to play.{^N}{^N}We do not pinch, we do not bite{^N}But all the same, you’ll fear the night.{^N}We fling our bolts of shadow true{^N}We try our best to destroy you!{^N}{^N}So ‘ware young hero, heed me well{^N}We come from Hades, not from Hell{^N}But just the same, you’ll be the one{^N}To fall to those who shun the sun.
tagSkillDescription030: Provides the arcane knowledge and mental discipline to study the dark art of controlling spirits.
tagSkillDescription160: Bolsters the life-force of yourself and nearby allies.
xtagMonsterAnteokHero03: Myrto of the Shadow Grove ~ Anteok Hero
xtagScrollDesc029: Calls upon a mighty Cyclops to do the caster's bidding.  Due to the iron will of the Cyclops, however, mastery of this fearsome being can only be held for a short time.
tagAnimalPartDesc003: Toughened hide of a wild boar.  Can enhance all armor.
xtagSkillArtifactDescription018: Restores the player and all nearby allies to full health.
tagSkillDescription034: Intensifies the rate and duration of life consumption leaving enemies shriveled and lifeless
tagRelicDescription10: Herakles was the strongest of all the Greek heroes.  Can enchant all armor.
tagMonsterName1238: Swiftstream, Chieftain of the Five Clans ~ Yerren Hero
xtagSkillArtifactDescription020: Makes the player and all allies immune to elemental damage and ranged weaponry for a duration.
tagSkillDescription065: Grants the inner harmony and patience necessary to learn the language of wild creatures and master the hidden power of nature.
xtagScroll027: Greater Scroll of the Demonic Jester
xtagParchmentBody01: Dear Mom,{^N}{^N}It has been six weeks since heroboy came this way.  Susan has been making eyes at me, and I have to admit that I find her quite charming.  To be frank, this might partially be because she’s the only female satyr I’ve seen yet in these parts.{^N}{^N}On that note, it’s appalling to see this kind of rampant sexism within the ranks of the Beastman Army.  I’m sure there are plenty of qualified woman satyrs who would like a shot at military service.  Heck, even the name of the organization is sexist!  I’m sure the maenads don’t appreciate being a part of the BeastMAN Army.  As such, I’ve begun lobbying for a more inclusive name, but have yet to decide on something more suitable.  Beastperson Army?  Beastpeople Corps?  So far my efforts have been met with derision, but I’m confident that I will bring the brass around.  They can’t afford a lawsuit with all the money they’ve lost from heroboy opening our chests and stealing all our gold.{^N}{^N}I have to go now – our scouts saw heroboy coming on the horizon.  Again, thanks for the CARE package.  You have no idea how much our guys appreciated the cookies and body armor.{^N}{^N}{^N}Sincerely,{^N}{^N}Mark (aka Beastman Archer #783)
xtagSkillDreamDescription010: Vanish from the waking world and reappear  before a target enemy to deliver a monstrous attack.
tagMonsterName1142: Akil the Shadowborn ~ Dune Raider Hero
xtagSkillEquipmentDescription004: A combat technique that uses the bow to rapidly shoot three times in succession.
tagSkillDescription146: Lacerate multiple enemies in a single attack with this powerful sweeping cut.
tagSkillDescription113: Three jets of flame erupt from the caster's hands each inflicting incinerating fire damage to enemies.
xtagSkillMonsterDescription002: A wave of focused energy ripples outward through the ground causing earth and rock to explode upwards.
xtagScroll032: Divine Scroll of the Unbreakable Alliance
tagSkillDescription050: Provides the physical conditioning and secret knowledge necessary to train as a rogue.
tagSkillDescription141: Plague afflicts nearby enemies with a debilitating ailment that reduces their health and quickly spreads to other nearby creatures.
tagSkillDescription061: A single deadly hit that multiplies the damage of a normal weapon attack.
tagSkillDescription131: Performs a basic attack with your equipped weapon.
xtagScrollDesc014: Opens a conduit of pure energy that flows from the celestial planes into the caster, granting them improved control over their mystical powers.
xtagSkillDreamDescription004: A wave of force is projected outward that forms chaotic ripples in the fabric of reality and delivers devastating damage to the body and mind of enemies.
xtagScroll042: Divine Scroll of the Maddened God
tagRelicName024: Incarnation of the Valor of Achilles
tagMonsterName1146: Najja the Parched ~ Dune Raider Hero
tagSkillDescription154: Provokes enemies to draw their attention away from allies.
xtagSkillArtifactDescription004: Let loose a mighty roar, greatly bolstering the combat skills of the player and nearby allies for a short time.
xtagParchmentBody08: 3 enchanted spears{^N}Whetstone{^N}2 T-bone steaks{^N}Litter for chamberpot{^N}Kibble{^N}Milk – 2 jugs{^N}New scratching post for baby{^N}Bow – for shooting{^N}Bow – for hair{^N}Catnip
tagSkillDescription014: Executes a devastating spinning attack that can damage up to four enemies.  Initially each hit is not as powerful as a normal attack but the effectiveness increases every level.
tagMonsterName1143: Badru the Mad ~ Dune Raider Hero
tagSkillDescription096: Draw your enemies into the open, making them more vulnerable to attack.
tagSkillDescription138: Your War Horn heralds the doom of your enemies, shattering their nerves and reducing their ability to defend themselves.
tagRelicName070: Incarnation of the Monkey King's Trickery
xtagSkillEquipmentDescription007: A spurt of poison temporarily blinds enemies and causes damage over time.
tagSkillDescription060: Increases the duration and damage of internal bleeding
tagSkillDescription127: A fighting technique that utilizes the shield to slam into enemies, knocking them senseless.
tagSkillDescription148: With guile and insidious powers of persuasion, trick enemies into temporarily aiding you in battle.
xtagParchmentBody04: O Dark Lord, hear my plea!{^n}{^n}My death has come and come again.  All the earth and all that lives upon it is born and reborn in the cycles of life and death, all is change and all is the same.  I have felt the cruel bite of swords, the piercing of the arrow’s shaft.  Flame has seared my flesh and cold chilled me to the marrow of my bones.  All deaths have been mine, again and once again as the heroes come to where I stand, sword in hand, ready for the moment when I must die once more.  As the fear and bloodlust take me, I raise my arm to strike, hoping against hope that this time – this once – I shall emerge the victor.  It is not to be.{^N}{^N}O Eater of Souls, hear me now!  I am but a humble Daemon in the service of our great lord Hades.  I have toiled for you these many ages.  Please forgive my impudent request, but I feel compelled to ask – please, oh please, can you put the good loot somewhere else?
xtagSkillArtifactDescription024: Blankets the area around you with scorching flames that hurt only enemies.
tagSkillDescription145: Removes all positive enchantments from enemies targets or all negative enchantments from friendly targets.  The sudden shock of enchantments torn off enemies inflicts vitality damage.
tagRelicDescription22: Yen-Lo-Wang is a god of Death and the ruler of Feng-Du, the Chinese Hell.  Can enchant all weapons.
tagSkillDescription139: The ominous call on this ancient heirloom will summon forth ghostly heroes of old from the Elysian Fields to do battle once more.
xtagScroll036: Divine Scroll of the Plague Corpse
tagSkillDescription041: When used as your default weapon attack, each hit leeches life from the target and replenishes your own.
tagMonsterName874: Dark Child of Pan ~ Veteran Warrior
tagSkillDescription114: Lobs a burning orb of fiery brimstone that explodes when it hits the ground inflicting fire and physical damage to enemies in a small radius.
xtagFormulaDescription041: Arcane Formula ~ Fury of the Ages
tagAnimalPartDesc011: A wispy, glowing substance.  Can enhance rings and amulets.
tagRelicDescription07: The Golden Fleece, sought after by Jason and his Argonauts, is rumored to hold great power as well as great beauty.  Can enchant torso armor only.
xtagRelicDescription07: Hector, prince of Troy, was renowned for his noble spirit and steadfast nature.  He fell defending his homeland, mourned even by his enemies.  Can enchant all shields.
tagRelicCombineDialog: Are you sure you wish to enhance this item?
tagSkillDescription035: A deathly chill radiates from the character slowing the attack and movement of enemies as it diminishes their life.
tagAnimalPartDesc005: Contains a deadly poison.  Can enhance all weapons.
tagSkillDescription027: When active, the player is imbued with the power of the storm, causing their attacks to strike with cold and lightning damage.
xtagSkillArtifactDescription019: Steals the energy of all enemies in the vicinity, harming them for every bit of energy stolen.
tagRelicDescription15: Amun-Ra, ruler of the sun, is the greatest of the Egyptian gods.  Can enchant all armor.
xtagRelicName017: Incarnation of the Blade of Thanatos
xtagScroll062: Divine Scroll of the Stalwart Alliance
xtagMonsterOdontoHero02: Terror of the Dark ~ Odontotyrannus Hero
tagSkillDescription187: Weakens the constitution of adjacent enemies making them more susceptible to physical and elemental damage.
xtagScroll065: Divine Scroll of the Ice Nova
xtagScrollDesc032: Grants the caster improved control over their inner powers, allowing them to use their skills more quickly and more effectively.
xtagMonsterFormicidHero06: General Ptch'k'k'ath the Manslayer ~ Pale Formicid Hero
xtagSkillArtifactDescription025: Invokes a storm cloud above the player--even indoors--which will rain down bolts of Zeus' lightning upon all enemies.
xtagScroll021: Greater Scroll of the Dark Arts
tagSkillDescription169: Marksmanship skill allows you to create and fire arrows that fly faster and increase pierce damage.  {^y}Apply this skill to your left mouse button.
tagSkillDescription080: Increases offensive ability and damage when fighting beasts and beastmen during Call of the Hunt
tagSkillDescription110: Encircles you in a searing ring of flames burning all enemies that come within its radius.
xtagSkillDreamDescription001: Expand your consciousness to draw more deeply from the power of the dream realm and exert your will upon physical reality.
tagSkillDescription104: Boosts the physical damage of attacks and provides a chance of causing critical fire damage while under the effects of Earth Enchantment.
tagSkillDescription175: The player's weapon is infused with the essence of frost, slowing enemies greatly and causing small amounts of damage.
tagSkillDescription128: Enter a state of heightened awareness that allows you and your nearby allies to perceive and respond to attacks more effectively.
tagSkillDescription111: An impervious layer of rock envelops you for a short duration boosting regeneration but prohibiting movement.
xtagSkillMonsterDescription001: Unleashes a wave of kinetic energy that travels through the ground causing rocks to explode in its wake.
tagRelicDescription17: The Udjat is the eye of Horus, hawk-headed god of the sky.  It symbolizes protection and power.  Can enchant all armor.
tagSkillDescription117: Each enemy hit has a chance of triggering an adrenaline rush that boosts life regeneration.
tagMonsterName1154: Iolanthe, Viper of Hellas ~ Gorgon Hero
tagSkillDescription120: A strong shield arm allows you to block multiple attackers with amazing speed when necessary but it can only be kept up for a short time.
tagRelicDescription21: The Jade Emperor is the ruler of the Chinese gods.  He is a contemplative deity who rarely interferes with the affairs of god or man.  Can enchant all armor.
tagSkillDescription218: Sends out a wave of ethereal energy that burns enemies' spirits out of existence.
tagMonsterName1225: Ji Bao the Dishonored ~ Skeletal Hero
xtagSkillArtifactDescription012: Move with divine grace for a short duration, becoming almost impossible to hit.
tagSkillDescription057: Coats your weapons with deadly poison while activated.
xtagAnimalPartDesc006: A splinter from one of the Crystals of Erebus, the source of Hades' power in the world of the living.  Can enhance head armor only.
tagRelicName057: Essence of the Code of Hammurabi
tagSkillDescription180: Creates a shield of energy that will nullify all incoming damage from elemental attacks.
tagSkillDescription055: Adds a chance for poison to cloud an enemy's mind, sending them into a state of confusion.
tagSkillDescription140: When you attack from a running charge, your sudden assault will overwhelm adjacent enemies disrupting attacks and weakening their defenses.
tagMonsterName1152: Cenobia, Queen of Snakes ~ Gorgon Hero
tagRelicDescription12: Set is the Egyptian god of evil.  In an attempt to take control of the throne of the gods, Set turned on his brother Osiris, brutally hacking the latter's body apart and scattering the pieces across the land.  Can enchant all armor.
xtagSkillArtifactDescription006: Makes the blood boil within the veins of all nearby opponents, wounding them and magically replenishing the player's own life at the same time.
xtagSkillArtifactDescription021: A cloud of dark dreams spreads out from the player, putting all enemies to sleep.  When they awaken, they will be filled with confusion, terror, and lethargy.
xtagSkillArtifactDescription023: Makes the player completely invulnerable to all forms of damage for a short duration.
tagMonsterName195: Lacius ~ Spartan Master of the Staff
tagMonsterName1224: Fenuku, Martyr of the Crimson Brotherhood ~ Skeletal Hero
tagSkillDescription200: Causes the Negative Energy Vortex to blast through the primary target and hit adjacent enemies.
tagRelicDescription16: The Djed is the backbone of Osiris, lord of the dead.  Can enchant all weapons.
xtagSkillDreamDescription007: A precognitive sense of the imminent future allows you to stay one step ahead of your enemies in combat.
xtagFormulaDescription042: Arcane Formula ~ Eye of the Heavens
tagSkillDescription214: The magic practitioners of older civilizations devised many insidious techniques to bolster the destructive capabilities of their magical staves.  Knowledge of these methods will unlock the true power of your staff attacks.
tagSkillDescription203: Adds a chance for attacks to stun enemies and increases the duration of stun attacks when wielding a club or axe.
xtagScrollDesc019: Sends shockwaves of force through the surrounding ground, damaging and stunning any nearby enemies.
tagSkillDescription007: Total focus in the heat of battle allows you to ignore physical and piercing damage.
tagRelicDescription23: Hammurabi, king of Babylon, was revered for bringing justice to his people with his code of laws.  Can enchant rings and amulets.
xtagFormulaDescription070: Arcane Formula ~ Marduk's Tablet of Destiny
xtagScrollDesc004: Grants an aura which improves both the armor and attack strength of the caster and their allies.
tagRelicName054: Essence of the Monkey King's Trickery
tagAnimalPartDesc008: A disgusting glob of pus, blood, and bile.  Can enhance rings and amulets.
tagMonsterName1145: The Faceless One ~ Dune Raider Hero
tagAnimalPartDesc018: High quality feathers.  Can enhance all armor.
tagSkillDescription023: Increasing the speed and damage of Ice Shard. Gives each shard a chance to punch through its target and keep going.
xtagMonsterMachaeHero01: Sentinel Nok-hai, Guardian of the Necklace ~ Machae Hero
tagSkillDescription026: Causes electricity to leap from the target of your Lightning Bolt skill and strike additional nearby enemies.
xtagSkillDreamDescription013: The hypnotic eye of the Nightmare is able to dominate the minds of lesser monsters and control their actions.
tagRelicDescription05: Prometheus, son of the titan Iapetus, gave the gift of fire to mankind.  Can enchant all weapons.
xtagRelicName006: Essence of the Rage of Ares
xtagFormulaDescription010: Arcane Formula ~ Touch of the Fool
xtagRelicName012: Embodiment of the Iron Will of Ajax
tagSkillDescription088: Take full advantage of your enemy's mistakes and vulnerable moments to inflict savage wounds.
tagMonsterName878: Dark Child of Pan ~ Elite Peltast
xtagSkillDreamDescription008: Sends out a powerful ripple of distortion around the player that tears the fabric of reality, causing severe damage to enemies caught within it.
xtagScroll018: Greater Scroll of the Unbreakable Alliance
tagSkillDescription178: Protects allies from the elements reducing the damage caused by elemental based attacks.
xtagSkillArtifactDescription015: Builds up the melee power of the player to epic proportions.
tagSkillDescription020: Hurls a ball of electrical energy that damages and stuns enemies in a small blast radius.
xtagMonsterFormicidHero02: Ft'ch'ssk, Guardian of the Queen ~ Formicid Hero
tagSkillDescription172: A combat technique that uses the spear or bow to inflict deep wounds that will result in prolonged bleeding.
tagMonsterName1037: Guardian of the Underworld ~ Hound of Anubis
xtagScroll053: Divine Scroll of the Archmage's Fury
xtagMonsterLostSoulHero01: Nikias, Betrayer of Sparta ~ Lost Soul Hero
tagSkillDescription094: Making use of available cover as you press your attack allows you to avoid unnecessary damage.
xtagFormulaDescription067: Arcane Formula ~ Talisman of the Jade Emperor
xtagParchmentBody10: My dear Mr. Wood,{^N}{^N}I apologize for not writing sooner, but I thought that you might still be angry at me for that earlier incident.  In any case, I trust that you are enjoying your stay down in the Pits?  I’m told that it’s quite nice this time of year.  Of course, I myself have been too busy working in the land of Men to make the visit myself, but I do intend to stop by someday.  I believe that I may even be able to persuade your jailers to stop the torture for a few hours.  I have some sway with upper management, if I do say so myself.{^N}{^N}Well then.  Much as I'd love to go on, I believe I’ll have to cut this short.  I’m still on assignment, and I have much to do.  I certainly wouldn’t want to fail at the task I’ve been given.  As you well know, the effects of that can be disastrous.{^N}{^N}{^N}Yours,{^N}{^N}S.C. Tape
xtagParchmentBody07: My darling,{^N}{^N}It has been weeks since the troubles came, weeks since I last beheld your beautiful face.  I cannot continue this way.  We have been separated too long.  I pine for your touch.  Your sweet lips, like pomegranate wine, are all that I can think of.  I am consumed with longing, I burn with the desire to be near you once more.{^N}{^N}The village elders do not wish us to leave the village borders, but I can wait no longer.  Tonight I shall wait until father is asleep, then sneak under cover of darkness to your home in Rhodes.  Please be waiting for me – I will throw pebbles at your window so that you know when I’ve arrived.{^N}{^N}{^N}With all the love my heart can bear,{^N}{^N}Misenus
tagSkillDescription015: Adds bleeding damage to War Wind and increases the number of enemies hit.  Requires at least one sword, axe, or spear.
xtagSkillArtifactDescription026: Sends forth a wave of sonic energy which stuns and damages all enemies in its path.
tagSkillDescription174: Throw down a mighty standard to embolden the hearts of nearby allies.
tagMonsterName1171: Sadiki, Champion of Anubis ~ Jackalman Hero
tagAnimalPartDesc016: A scrap of skin from a Desert Hag.  Can enhance all armor.
tagMonsterName877: Dark Child of Pan ~ Elite Warrior
tagSkillDescription038: Adds a chance that each hit with Dire Strike will negate energy from your target and inflict energy burn.
tagMonsterName1118: Cadmus, the Golem King ~ Automatoi Hero
tagRelicName066: Embodiment of the Domain of the Dragon-Kings
xtagScroll019: Greater Scroll of the Warrior's Song
tagSkillDescription046: Draw upon even greater otherworldly powers to augment yourself and allies in battle, but be wary of the cost exacted from your own vitality.
tagSkillDescription121: Understanding how to properly adjust and move in armor allows you to wear heavier armor and shields than an untrained warrior of equivalent strength could manage.
tagAnimalPartDesc004: A lump of dense plant matter.  Can enhance all armor.
tagMonsterName1140: Agall, Keeper of the Flame ~ Dragonian Hero
tagSkillDescription144: Triggered by an adrenaline rush, the body's natural resistances increase allowing you to more easily endure the elements.
tagSkillDescription215: Reduced visibility inside the Squall makes it difficult for enemies to effectively attack or defend themselves.
tagRelicDescription18: Li-Nezha, a Chinese trickster god, is as nimble as he is crafty.  Can enchant all armor.
tagSkillDescription052: Throw a piercing blade at your opponent capable of causing prolonged bleeding.
tagSkillDescription091: Living off the land, you learn to identify and utilize medicinal plants to create healing salves.  When applied it will fortify against poison and healing is accelerated for a duration.
xtagSkillDreamDescription022: Enhances the power of the distortion ripple, unleashing a surge of psionic energy that causes massive damage to enemies and temporarily freezes them in time.
tagSkillDescription069: The power of the grove revitalizes those within and reduces the energy consumed by skill use.
tagSkillDescription024: Increases the number of shards cast, sending a deadly torrent at enemies.
xtagScrollDesc023: Infuses the caster with the spirit of the hunt, speeding their attacks and improving their abilities with bow and spear.
xtagMonsterHydradonHero04: The Rotting Devourer ~ Stygian Hydradon Hero
tagSkillDescription149: Summon an immortal Storm Wisp from the atmosphere to battle your enemies.
xtagParchmentBody09: Good morning, and welcome to the first day of the rest of your unlife!{^N}{^N}You may be feeling confused.  Frustrated.  Disoriented.  You may feel that you’ve been cheated or otherwise treated unfairly.  We understand.  This transition is difficult for most new souls, but we here at the Underworld Bureau of Soul Contentment are here to help.  In this guidebook you will find a variety of helpful advice on these exciting topics:{^N}{^N}Paying the Ferryman, Or What To Do With Those Coins On Your Eyes{^N}{^N}The Three Judges, Or Why Kicking That Puppy Wasn’t Such a Good Idea After All{^N}{^N}Socializing With Other Souls, Or How to Get a Life When You’re Dead{^N}{^N}Haunting the Living, Or How to Say “Boo!”{^N}{^N}...and much, much more!{^N}{^N}So buck up, fellow.  Despite your current condition, you still have many centuries of happy existence before you.{^N}{^N}{^N}  Sincerely,{^N}{^N}Lord Zher’khul{^N}Liche King and Underworld Bureau Chief
xtagScrollDesc028: Summons a pair of powerful Harpy witches.  Using fierce lightning attacks, these fearsome beasts devastate enemies from a distance.
tagMonsterName875: Dark Child of Pan ~ Veteran Peltast
tagSkillDescription099: Under tremendous heat and pressure, the composition of the Core Dweller hardens making it more resistant to damage.
xtagSkillDreamDescription011: Devastate your enemies and steal their power by ripping the very dreams from their minds.
tagSkillDescription001: Provides physical conditioning and discipline that will allow your character to master the skills of a warrior.
tagSkillDescription209: Leeches life from an enemy to replenish your own.
xtagMonsterHydradonHero03: The Dark Maw ~ Stygian Hydradon Hero
xtagSkillArtifactDescription022: Summons the Avatar of Bast--a spectral Sabre Lion--to ravage your enemies.
tagSkillDescription062: Oils harvested from deadly Nightshade plants give your Envenomed Weapons the ability to slow enemies.
tagSkillDescription155: Mysterious otherworldly entities offer great power to Spirit Masters who can commune with them.  The cost, however, is measured in life.
tagRelicDescription08: The drink of Dionysus, Greek god of wine and revelry, is a potent brew indeed.  Can enchant rings and amulets.
tagSkillDescription206: Absorbs a portion of the life that leaves enemies as you inflict weapon damage upon them.
tagSkillDescription199: Creates a vortex of negative energy that strips negative enchantments off allies and positive enchantments off enemies.  Also drains enemy energy and inflicts damage equal to a portion of the energy depleted.
tagSkillDescription049: Imbues you with the deathly powers of a wraith, adding life leech to your attacks and increasing resistance to all damages but it also causes you to lose life while active.
tagSkillDescription025: Calls down a powerful bolt of lightning from the heavens to decimate your target.
tagSkillDescription143: Learn to throw additional knives at once and cut down enemies with a lethal flurry of razor-sharp metal.
tagSkillDescription137: A running attack that slams into the enemy with your shield causing bonus damage and stunning them.
tagSkillDescription122: The resolute call of your horn can turn the tide of battle, inspiring all in its range to fight with renewed vitality.
xtagScrollDesc010: Creates a field of energy that weakens the defenses of enemies caught inside.
tagAnimalPartDesc014: Claw of a Peng.  Can enhance all weapons.
tagSkillDescription072: A wave of healing energy rapidly restores lost life to the target ally.
tagSkillDescription056: Learn alchemical processes to distill natural toxins, increasing the potency and duration of all poison attacks.
tagSkillDescription006: You build momentum as you drive your attack forward, attacking and moving more rapidly.
xtagAnimalPartDesc001: The jagged shell of a Karkinos.  Can enhance shields.
xtagSkillEquipmentDescription008: Temporarily drains an enemies strength and vigor
xtagScroll015: Greater Scroll of the Breaking Wheel
tagSkillDescription032: Assaults the minds of surrounding enemies with images of their own death causing the weak-hearted to flee in horror and more resolute foes to fight less effectively.
tagSkillDescription152: Adds retaliation fire damage to Stone Form.
xtagScroll029: Divine Scroll of the Breaking Wheel
tagSkillDescription119: Increases the shock effect of Shield Charge, startling adjacent enemies and disrupting skill use for a time.
tagSkillDescription071: An instinctual will to live is triggered whenever health is low.
tagSkillDescription192: Even the sturdiest armor has its chinks.  The best way to stay alive is to not get hit.
tagSkillDescription107: Increases the damage and duration of burn damage.
xtagSkillArtifactDescription027: Summons an invisible spirit armed with scimitars to fight for the player.
tagMonsterName1244: Reshelf, Undying King of Nubia ~ Zombie Hero
xtagScrollDesc003: Sends a blast of bitter cold air out from the caster's location.
xtagParchmentBody03: big boss demon say i haff to rite to explane akshun.  OK.{^N}{^N}it simple:  gronk smash ukla cuz ukla make fun of gronks club.  you see?  i haff every reeson to smash ukla.  no need to push gronk in pit of dispare.{^N}{^N}i hope you see now that i had no choyce.  pleese no pit of dispare?  gronk thank you for your niceness!
tagSkillDescription204: Encases enemies in ice, immobilizing them but also making them more difficult to damage.
tagAnimalPartDesc013: Sharp, jagged tooth torn from a Raptor's mouth.  Can enhance amulets only.
tagSkillDescription021: Enhances the power of Thunderball causing sparks to leap from the initial explosion.  Each spark that hits an enemy inflicts lightning damage and stuns.
tagRelicName055: Essence of the Jade Emperor's Serenity
tagMonsterName1235: Absyrtus, Lichelord of the Paethian Gate ~ Wraith Hero
xtagSkillDreamDescription005: Amplifies the physical distortion effect, causing it to shatter armor and break bones.
xtagRelicName009: Embodiment of the Cunning of Odysseus
tagAnimalPartDesc002: Hollow fang of a Cave Bat.  Can enhance all weapons.
tagMonsterName194: Selinius ~ Spartan Master of the Sword
xtagSkillArtifactDescription002: A wave of pure darkness will blast outward from the player's feet to wound all enemies in the vicinity.
tagSkillDescription195: Packed with volatile liquid and metal scraps, the Poison Gas Bomb will explode violently on impact showering the area with deadly Shrapnel.  Each fragment of shrapnel inflicts piercing damage to the enemies it hits.
xtagParchmentBody16: Dear Mummy,{^N}{^N}Camp has been great.  I’ve earned lots of merit badges, and Mr. Smithicus told me I was better at Bandaging and First Aid than anyone he’s ever seen!  We also get to see a guest speaker every Wednesday.  You should come – then everyone can see that I’m related to a famous wrapper!{^N}{^N}The food is awful, though.  They don’t know how to cook a decent meal for us undead folk.  I wish someone would make the chefs urn their keep.  Really, it’s a pretty grave situation altogether.  In fact, yesterday something on my plate MOVED!  I was really crypt out!{^N}{^N}Anyway, enough about me.  How are you doing down there in the land of sunshine and monoliths?  Still making money off that pyramid scheme?  Keep it up, and you’ll be Set for life!{^N}{^N}{^N}Abedju Farewell,{^N}{^N}Puniti the Unshriven, Jr.
tagRelicDescription19: True to the tenets of Taoism, even Guan-Yu, the Taoist god of war, only fights when all other options have been exhausted.  Can enchant torso armor only.
tagMonsterName196: Selinius ~ Spartan Master of the Bow
tagRelicName042: Embodiment of the Ankh of Isis
xtagFormulaDescription007: Arcane Formula ~ Shroud of Eternal Night
tagSkillDescription237: Causes diseased enemies to waste away weakening their resistance to physical attacks and slowing their movements.
tagSkillDescription191: The howl of your wolves emboldens the hearts of those who hear it causing them to fight more fiercely.
tagMonsterName1155: Letha, the Carrion Queen ~ Harpy Hero
xtagSkillDreamDescription026: A ripple of energy from the dream world expands outward, damaging enemies.
